participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, loves to share stories and enjoys a good laugh.
participant_1.background: i live in alabama. i've one brother. i like tacos. i have three sisters. i love dogs.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and thoughtful, always eager to help others and has a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
